name: Chinese-Style Corn Salad
keywords: corn kernels, rice vinegar, sesame oil, raw, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 3 cups fresh cooked corn kernels, cut from the cob while warm

recipeInstructions.text: Toss kernels with sesame oil, rice vinegar, salt and pepper. Season to taste, adding more vinegar or salt and pepper as necessary. Once corn is cool, add minced scallions. Toss lightly and chill briefly before serving.
